body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
@alphabrother I mean, they've waited 6 years and gone through puberty twice. I'd be pretty nervous, too.
even with a second chance to get herself back to being a guy, she's still so slow on making the wish lol. and now become a waifu
This need a translation in my opinion also in german or somethings
@goatmon lol I guess dude just really wanted a waifu.
how to change your gender: time travel ala japan

So, the dude uses his friend to have a wish granted that forces his friend to relive the last 6 years as a girl and become his girlfriend.

Then, instead of fixing this when they get to make a wish again in the present, he again uses the wish for himself again to ensure she'll love him forever.

What an asshole.
